Title: Slay the Saboteurs
Description:
The nerubians are everywhere, $n.

There are too many for all of them to be solely crash survivors. I've seen others burrowing up from the ground. 

This Queensguard Zirix was laying in wait here to overwhelm us.

Let them know we are not easy prey. Cut them down!
CompletionText: We need to thin their numbers if we are to survive this.
RewardText: Good work. And we've made progress as well. Perhaps now we can press forward.
